name: new-ggv-gps
description: MyGGV GPS - Optimized GPS navigation for Garden Grove Village, Philippines with MapLibre native APIs

scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build completed successfully for Netlify deployment'
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
